title.narrative: CG Rep: Transparency & Governance Repeat Project

description.narrative: To strengthen the capacity of targeted public sector ministries, agencies and accountability structures for improved management of human and financial resources.

Ministry of Economy, Finance, Planning, Public Portfolio, and Integration

title.narrative: : National Budget prepared in accordance with the MTEF;
Annual budget execution law is prepared in due time and is publically available;
Annual report of the Supreme Audit Authority and the State General Inspectorate are publicly available
Investment projects for which feasibility study is prepared;
Indicator Three: Ghost workers (determined by payroll audits) removed from payroll
Indicator One: Deviation between actual and budgeted expenditure by targeted ministries reduced from 40 % to less than 10 % by the end of the Project;
Perception by the citizens of the quality of the public investment
Indicator Two: Public contracts > FCAF 250 million awarded under competitive basis
Ministries who prepared annual M&E reports;
Number of targeted Ministries that have implemented the Anti-Corruption Action Plan
Percentage of procurement complaints monitored by hotline under a determined time frame
Civil Servant salary executed through an automated payroll system
Number of NGO that have been initiated anti-corruption activities
Ghost workers identified in the payroll
Procurement Plan implementation by Targeted Ministries
Rate of achievement of RRI expected results in 100 days:
Sectoral Ministries with a CGMP and an approved Procurement Plan:
Project Progress and Monitoring reports submitted on time
